content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings, Maryam. Although our background may differ, for this negotiation, let us focus solely on the rental price of the apartment in Munich. I have high expectations, so I'll start with a proposal of 1500 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for initiating the discussion about the rental price. However, I don't want to continue the negotiation at this initial high point as my budget is limited. I'm seeking a more affordable option.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my primary goal is to secure the highest possible rental price, and your initial response indicates a lower budget than what I had in mind. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
